name: Alright, We're Gonna Walk Now...
description:
After a long night out at the bar, you're ready to go home and get some sleep. Only problem is that you have to drive your buddy home, and he's WASTED! Search for your car and hang on to your friend in this comedic spin on the dreaded escort mission.

Programming : Roger Levy
Art and sound : Tristan Heles
Drunk: Eli Herrnstadt
Player : Joseph DeSimone

Made for LudumDare GameJam 46 under the theme "Keep It Alive"

(May not be suitable for young children)
